projectGridLines.title: Project Titles mentioned in the description
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Re-architecting Postman's Collection Codebase

Description: Work on re-architecting core flows of Postman's collection feature to optimize

performance and improve 99th percentile (aka P99) loading time metrics. Tasks include

code optimization, transitioning from synchronous to asynchronous flows, removing

redundant code, implementing pagination, and reducing complexities.

Skill sets: Node.js, MySQL, Microservices Architecture, Monitoring Tools (New Relic)

Traits expectation: Strong problem-solving skills, Attention to detail, Eagerness to learn

and adapt, Good in DS & Database concepts, Team player with good communication skills

Expected learning: Advanced Node.js, MySQL optimization. Microservices design.

Performance optimization strategies, Asynchronous programming, Monitoring and

performance analysis (New Relic)

Specific courses required for project execution: DS & Algos, OS, Databases

Title: Optimise the P95 for Public Documentation

Description: This will involve understanding how the collection documentation is rendered,

how the workflows of caching and cache expiry works, critical API loading paths,

optimsations related to the critical paths, DOM virtualisation for the components especially

in case of large documentations. This also includes instrumenting and measuring various

client side performance metrics and coming up with a plan to optimise for each of those

metrics.

Skill sets: Javascript, React, Node.js, MySQL, Microservices Architecture, Monitoring Tools

(New Relic)

Traits expectation: Strong problem-solving skills, Attention to detail, Eagerness to learn

and adapt, Team player with good communication skills

Expected learning: Advanced React and Node.js, Microservices design, Performance

optimization strategies, Asynchronous programming, Monitoring and performance analysis

(New Relic)

Specific courses required for project execution: React, Node.js, MySQL, OOP

Title: Load testing and scaling mock servers to support 10k rpm limit per team

Description: This requires understanding of critical API collection API loading for mocks,

optimising the matching algorithms, caching and expiry of collection data, understanding the

pods and pod based scaling, estimating the capacity of pods and improving the bottlenecks

in mock execution. This will require load testing of the existing systems and other

dependent systems in the critical path. This might require some architectural changes as

well.

Skill sets: Node.js, MySQL, Microservices Architecture, Monitoring Tools (New Relic)

Traits expectation: Strong problem-solving skills, Attention to detail, Eagerness to learn

and adapt, Team player with good communication skills

Expected learning: Advanced React and Node.js, Microservices design, Performance

optimization strategies, Asynchronous programming, Monitoring and performance analysis

(New Relic)

Specific courses required for project execution: DS & Algos, OS, Databases

Title: Improve end to end test coverage for Postman Secret Scanner feature

Description: Writing automations for Postman Secret Scanner features to improve quality

of feature. Tasks include writing integration tests, Postman collections to monitor feature

flows.

Skill sets: Basics of JavaScript, Node.js,

Traits expectation: Team player, communications, curiosity, eager to learn

Expected learning: Writing production ready code

Specific courses required for project execution: DS & AlgosNetwork Security

Title: Show most active Workspaces in a team

Description: Create a feature to determine and show most used workspaces within a team


based on different data sources like activities, user actions etc.

Skill sets: Node.js, MySQL, Microservices Architecture

Traits expectation: Strong problem-solving skills, Attention to detail, Eagerness to learn

and adapt

Expected learning: Asynchronous programming, Node.js, MySQL schema design,

Microservices API design, Monitoring and performance analysis (New Relic)

Specific courses required for project execution: OOP, DB
